description: The tnClear notification is generated to report the results
of the clear function that was run as a result of setting
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClear TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearName s EXAMPLE TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearParams s EXAMPLE TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearLastClearedTime t 31536000 TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearResult i 2 TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearErrorText s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClear TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearName s EXAMPLE TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearParams s EXAMPLE TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearLastClearedTime t 31536000 TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearResult i 1 TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearErrorText s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the application clear function associated with this
variables.name: TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearName

description: The tnClearParams string is a sequence of parameter name
value pairs to be used to determine the managed object to
which to apply the application clear function associated with
variables.name: TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearParams

description: The tnClearLastClearedTime variable contains the sysUpTime
value when tnClearAction was last set to 'doAction (1)' to
run the application clear function associated with this row entry.
variables.name: TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearLastClearedTime

description: The result of the last attempt to enact the application clear
function associated with this row entry.
variables.name: TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearResult

description: If the result of the last attempt to enact the application clear
function associated with this row entry failed, tnClearResult is
'failure (2)', tnClearErrorText contains a text string to further
explain the cause of the failure.
variables.name: TN-CLEAR-MIB::tnClearErrorText
